author: slava77
body:
recent updates in 106X miniAOD are no longer directly compatible with 102X miniAOD.
The 2018 nanoAOD workflow 136.8521 is set up to use the 2018 prompt reco data made in 102X.
This should be processed with ```run2_nanoAOD_102Xv1``` modifier.

this is a follow up to the discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26486#issuecomment-489096463
title: define  nano 2018 _102Xv1 steps and use in 2018 data nano wf 136.8521
